.sprite {
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    display: block;
}

.sprite-icon-check-off {
    width: 23px;
    height: 23px;
    background-position: -15px -15px;
}

.sprite-icon-check-on {
    width: 27px;
    height: 23px;
    background-position: -15px -68px;
}

.sprite-icon-fb {
    width: 12px;
    height: 22px;
    background-position: -15px -121px;
}

.sprite-icon-inst {
    width: 21px;
    height: 21px;
    background-position: -15px -173px;
}

.sprite-icon-radio-off {
    width: 25px;
    height: 25px;
    background-position: -15px -224px;
}

.sprite-icon-radio-on {
    width: 25px;
    height: 25px;
    background-position: -15px -279px;
}

.sprite-icon-vk {
    width: 26px;
    height: 15px;
    background-position: -15px -334px;
}
